december hat is worked in the round from the brim kelbourne woolens germantown 100% n american up wool 220 yds/100 gm skein old blue 446 1 skein gauge a tubular cast on is followed by 2 x 2 ribbing that 1 cable repeat 22 sts = 3 75 9 5 cm on larger ndls transitions into thick cable panels for the body integrated after blocking decreased shape the crown a pom pom and cute custom 24 rnds = 4 10 cm in cable patt on larger ndls after kw tag completes the look blocking needles if you would prefer not to work the tubular cast on work 1 16 40 cm us 5 3 75 mm circular the cast on as follows then move ahead to brim 1 16 40 cm us 7 4 5 mm circular using smaller ndls and long tail cast on co 100 sts join 1 set us 7 4 5 mm dpns for working in the round being careful not to twist sts pm check your gauge and adjust needle size s accordingly if necessary indicating beg of round notions darning needle stitch marker cable needle optional the chart is worked 5 times around when working the kelbourne woolens label sewing thread sharp sewing crown decreases change to double pointed needles when needle waste yarn crochet hook for provisional cast on the circumference is too small to fit onto the circulars size 18 75 47 5 cm circumference 9 23 cm height abbrevations skills c1/1r sl 1 st to cn hold back k1 k1 from cn knitting purling cable patterns from charts c1/1l sl 1 st to cn hold front k1
